page.title: 17Careers in Rising Brook.
page.content: Rising Brook High School is situated on the A449 Wolverhampton Road not far from the M6 motorway. It offers education for children in the Rising Brook and Moss Pit area. The school closely liaises with the careers office providing a mutual link between the two. Every 2-3 years a careers convention is held. The top half of the school is optimistic about gaining employment but the lower half is pessimistic. For those who are successful, their employment is usually in the immediate area such as working at G.E.C.. The pupils who stay on into the 6th form tend to go further afield. In 1983 the 5th form objected to the Youth Training Scheme but more recently they have been more enthusiastic.
